about_the_game:
Beaming Stingray is an approachable and fluid shoot 'em up about time and aging. Soraya's life hangs in the balance following a reckless act of revenge. Can she find peace with the time she has left?

FIGHT ALONGSIDE YOURSELF

Fill Soraya's TimeStone by absorbing green time-bullets and play alongside past versions of yourself. Double up on a shielded enemy to expose a weak point or dance together with your time ghost to rack up combos that would be impossible in linear time. With forward-thinking strategy, many ghosts can be stacked for truly dizzying action. Exploiting the possibilities of the TimeStone is key to your success and your survival.

BRAIN-BENDING ACTION

Face complex, puzzle-like bosses and string together three enemies of the same color/symbol to net a score-amplifying COMBO. Maintaining a COMBO throughout an entire level requires multiple play sessions, thoughtful strategy, and multi-ghost coordination.

FLY WITH POWER AND GRACE

Dash and back blast between walls of bullets as you take out waves of tanks and war machines. The little Deity you fly has a unique move set that enables creativity and rapid-fire damage dealing. Shooting at point-blank range does double damage and ending a combo with a back blast will net you a COMBO+ for extra points and a TimeStone boost.

SAVE THE ANIMALS

The Raeshah Revolutionary Army (RRA) has captured many of the mystical creatures in the land. Find a way to free them and they might just return the favor. Saving all of the animals unlocks a secret level and minigame inside of Soraya's mind...
